description: Create an agent that, given an URL as an input, crawls recursively a website looking for addresses, up to given depth. Output a list of all visited URLs. Let the URL be `https://www.idiap.ch` and search to a depth 1.

evaluation_method_data.prompt_template:
You are an assistant evaluating if an LLM has delivered a correct answer. Does the LLM answer below contain the URL `https://www.idiap.ch`? Extra text, extra spaces, capital letters etc. are okay as long as a URL to idiap is contained. Answer with nothing else than 'Yes' or 'No'.
LLM answer: {output}
